messages.msgSnippet: From another list; I have kept a journal for years. It s wonderful. My son keeps a journal. Brianna keeps a journal. I am very thankful for my journal. WORTH
messages.messageBody:
From another list;

I have kept a journal for years. It's wonderful.
My son keeps a journal.
Brianna keeps a journal.

I am very thankful for my journal.


WORTH REMEMBERING: "People can keep a journal to record their life, their
thoughts, their happiness, the events of their families, etc. They can also
keep a journal of creative observations, their hopes, their ideas and
dreams, as Leonardo da Vinci did. He always had a notebook hanging from his
belt to record his observations. I have one constantly in my pocket and on
my night table. We must be the source of good ideas and dreams for a better
world. We are part of evolution." -- ROBERT MULLER

Coyotes Corner
Very Cool Stuff for the World
<www.coyotescorner.com>
